video.title: Barbie Life in the Dreamhouse
video.synopsis: Join blond icon Barbie and her fabulous friends as their behind-the-scenes adventures are revealed in this animated Web series.

episodes.synopsis: When Barbie and the gang gather for a pool party, Ken builds a giant slide; Barbie and her pals get trapped in the Dreamhouse.
episodes.title: Perf Pool Party & Trapped in the Dreamhouse

episodes.synopsis: Join Barbie and her friends as their behind-the-scenes adventures are revealed in the animated web series Barbie Life in the Dreamhouse.
episodes.title: Best of Dreamhouse

episodes.synopsis: Join Barbie in these fun adventures as she celebrates her birthday with her besties, gives her pal Midge a makeover and sings a special song for Ken.
episodes.title: Best of Friends

episodes.synopsis: The girls go on a scavenger hunt; Chelsea adopts dolphins; and Stacie tries to earn a Wilderness Badge in these Dreamhouse family moments!
episodes.title: Best of Family

episodes.synopsis: Barbie and Ken have all sorts of adventures in this collection of their most memorable and hilarious dreamhouse moments.
episodes.title: Best of Ken

episodes.synopsis: Join Barbie and her friends in their most memorable and hilarious dreamhouse moments!
episodes.title: Best of Barbie

episodes.synopsis: Barbie competes with her friends and family on "The Amaze Chase," an exciting reality-TV contest that has them traveling and tackling fun challenges.
episodes.title: The Amaze Chase

episodes.synopsis: Laugh along with some of the most fun and memorable family moments between Barbie and her sisters as they prove there's no power like girl power.
episodes.title: Best of Sisters

episodes.synopsis: Slip on your heels and dive tiara-first into the fabulous world of fashion adventures with the world's premier icon, Barbie!
episodes.title: Best of Fashion

episodes.synopsis: It's the annual Sisters' Solstice, and Barbie must juggle her time between directing a music video and hanging out with Chelsea, Stacie and Skipper.
episodes.title: Sister's Fun Day

episodes.synopsis: Barbie's life in Malibu can get a little crazy! From blizzards to clones and red carpet madness, her sunny seaside town is filled with adventure.
episodes.title: Best of Malibu

episodes.synopsis: From a plethora of puppies to pet-sitting mishaps, follow Barbie and her plastic pet pals Taffy, Tawny and Blissa in fun and furry animal adventures.
episodes.title: Best of Pets
